net.recommenders.rival.evaluation.metric

Interface EvaluationMetric<V>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractErrorMetric, AbstractMetric, AbstractRankingMetric, MAE, MAP, NDCG, Precision, Recall, RMSE

    public interface EvaluationMetric<V>
    An evaluation metric expressing the quality of the evaluated system.
    Author:
    Alejandro

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void compute()
      Computes the evaluation metric.
      double getValue()
      Get the overall value of the metric.
      double getValue(V u)
      Get the value of the metric for a specific user.
      Map<V,Double> getValuePerUser()
      Get the value of the metric on a per-user basis.
